My name is Yoshikage Kira. I'm 33 years old. My house is in the northeast section of Morioh, where all the villas are, and I am not married. I work as an employee for the Kame Yu department stores, and I get home every day by 8 PM at the latest. I don't smoke, but I occasionally drink. I'm in bed by 11 PM, and make sure I get eight hours of sleep, no matter what. After having a glass of warm milk and doing about twenty minutes of stretches before going to bed, I usually have no problems sleeping until morning. Just like a baby, I wake up without any fatigue or stress in the morning. I was told there were no issues at my last check-up. I'm trying to explain that I'm a person who wishes to live a very quiet life. I take care not to trouble myself with any enemies, like winning and losing, that would cause me to lose sleep at night. That is how I deal with society, and I know that is what brings me happiness. Although, if I were to fight I wouldn't lose to anyone.
Yes I am

Heitmeyers Theory of social disintegration disagrees with you. The underlying idea is that lack of access, participation, and belonging causes a lack of recognition. When this happens, social and individual problems increase. Thus, deviant and violent behavior can be seen as one potential reaction to a lack of recognition and as a way to gain status and recognition in a different manner.

WRITING.TITLE: How do you defeat what you cant remember?
WRITING.TEXT: One of my friends reminded me of a few dr who monsters today who are all wuite terrifying and i got intrigued enough to use some of them in my campaign. Especially the Silence had caught my eye, for their ability of perfect camouflage: when you see them and then look away, all your knowledge of them is deleted. Any notes xou try to take while in contact are deleted and your memory is wiped Now I am sure that metagaming would be the largest concern but j trust my group in that regard But even I dont really know what weakness to give them or know in which ways they could be defeated. In the series they make one of the silence tell all humans (per broadcasting it during the moonlanding on tv) to kill the silence on sight but I am not sure how to hint at that or how to even grant them that opportunity
